articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Luis Rubiales resigns as president of the Spanish Football Federation after widespread criticism for kissing forward Jenni Hermoso at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Spanish FA president Rubiales resigns over Hermoso kiss

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: It should have been a time of great celebration for Spain but a historic Women's World Cup win has been overshadowed by a sexism scandal.
articles.title: The kiss that shook Spanish & global football

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The US and Vietnam are becoming better friends - and that's a troubling prospect for China.
articles.title: US and Vietnam get a friendship upgrade

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Consensus seemed far away, but India managed to bring together nations with starkly divergent views.
articles.title: How India overcame bitter G20 divisions over Ukraine

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ethiopia's giant hydroelectric dam on the Blue Nile stokes Egyptian fears of dire water shortages.
articles.title: Egypt angry as Ethiopia fills Nile dam reservoir amid water row

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A woman who shot to fame giving parenting advice has been charged with six counts of child abuse
articles.title: Ruby Franke and 8 passengers: The rise and fall of a parenting influencer

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Novak Djokovic draws level with Australian Margaret Court on 24 major singles titles by outlasting Daniil Medvedev in a punishing US Open final.
articles.title: Djokovic wins record-equalling 24th Grand Slam title

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Gen Mark Milley tells Laura Kuenssberg the autumn weather will make Ukraine's manoeuvres much harder.
articles.title: 30 fighting days left for Ukraine’s offensive - US army chief

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The attack in Khartoum killed at least 35 as fighting between factions continues, a charity says.
articles.title: Sudan conflict: Dozens killed in attack on Khartoum market, medics say

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Tory MPs call for China to be branded a threat, amid spy claims following the arrest of a Commons researcher.
articles.title: Government facing pressure to rethink China stance
